committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 5584 of title 5, United States Code, to include claims for overpayments of pay and allowances to employees of the Government Printing Office, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Includes claims for overpayments of pay and allowances to employees of the Government Printing Offices. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5584)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5584 of title 5, United States Code, to include claims for overpayments of pay and allowances to employees of the Government Printing Office, and for other purposes.
